00124         // Do NOT touch the following section!
00125         // status bar initialization - message timeout, idle icon and busy animation, etc
00126         ResourceMap resourceMap = getResourceMap();
00127         int messageTimeout = resourceMap.getInteger("StatusBar.messageTimeout");
00128         messageTimer = new Timer(messageTimeout, new ActionListener() {
00129 
00130             public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {
00131                 statusMessageLabel.setText("");
00132             }
00133         });
00134         messageTimer.setRepeats(false);
00135         int busyAnimationRate = resourceMap.getInteger("StatusBar.busyAnimationRate");
00136         for (int i = 0; i < busyIcons.length; i++) {
00137             busyIcons[i] = resourceMap.getIcon("StatusBar.busyIcons[" + i + "]");
00138         }
00139         busyIconTimer = new Timer(busyAnimationRate, new ActionListener() {
00140 
00141             public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent e) {
00142                 busyIconIndex = (busyIconIndex + 1) % busyIcons.length;
00143                 statusAnimationLabel.setIcon(busyIcons[busyIconIndex]);
00144             }
00145         });
00146         idleIcon = resourceMap.getIcon("StatusBar.idleIcon");
00147         statusAnimationLabel.setIcon(idleIcon);
00148         progressBar.setVisible(false);
00149 
00150         // connecting action tasks to status bar via TaskMonitor
00151         TaskMonitor taskMonitor = new TaskMonitor(getApplication().getContext());
00152         taskMonitor.addPropertyChangeListener(new java.beans.PropertyChangeListener() {
00153 
00154             public void propertyChange(java.beans.PropertyChangeEvent evt) {
00155                 String propertyName = evt.getPropertyName();
00156                 if ("started".equals(propertyName)) {
00157                     if (!busyIconTimer.isRunning()) {
00158                         statusAnimationLabel.setIcon(busyIcons[0]);
00159                         busyIconIndex = 0;
00160                         busyIconTimer.start();
00161                     }
00162                     progressBar.setVisible(true);
00163                     progressBar.setIndeterminate(true);
00164                 } else if ("done".equals(propertyName)) {
00165                     busyIconTimer.stop();
00166                     statusAnimationLabel.setIcon(idleIcon);
00167                     progressBar.setVisible(false);
00168                     progressBar.setValue(0);
00169                 } else if ("message".equals(propertyName)) {
00170                     String text = (String) (evt.getNewValue());
00171                     statusMessageLabel.setText((text == null) ? "" : text);
00172                 //messageTimer.restart();
00173                 } else if ("progress".equals(propertyName)) {
00174                     int value = (Integer) (evt.getNewValue());
00175                     progressBar.setVisible(true);
00176                     progressBar.setIndeterminate(false);
00177                     progressBar.setValue(value);
00178                 }
00179             }
00180         });
00181     }

00511     private JFileChooser fileChooser;
00512 
00517     @Action
00518     public void openDocument() {
00519         try {
00520             if (fileChooser == null) {
00521                 fileChooser = new JFileChooser();
00522                 fileChooser.setCurrentDirectory(new File("."));
00523             }
00524             if (fileChooser.showOpenDialog(this.getComponent()) == JFileChooser.APPROVE_OPTION) {
00525                 fieldURL.setText(fileChooser.getSelectedFile().getCanonicalPath());
00526             }
00527         } catch (IOException ex) {
00528             showErrorMessage(ex.toString());
00529         }
00530     }
00531 
00538     private void openDocument(String path) throws Exception {
00539 
00540         //Desktop.getDesktop().browse(new URI(path));
00541         if (System.getProperty("os.name").toLowerCase().indexOf("windows") > -1) {
00542             Runtime.getRuntime().exec("cmd /c " + path);
00543         } else if (System.getProperty("os.name").toLowerCase().indexOf("mac") > -1) {
00544             Runtime.getRuntime().exec("open " + path);
00545         } else {
00546             Runtime.getRuntime().exec("firefox " + path);
00547         }
00548     }
00549 
00556     private void clickDocuments(java.awt.event.MouseEvent evt) {//GEN-FIRST:event_clickDocuments
00557         try {
00558             int numberDoubleClicks = evt.getClickCount() / 2;
00559             if (numberDoubleClicks >= 1) {
00560                 for (int index : listDocuments.getSelectedRows()) {
00561                     String path = (String) infoDocuments.get(index).get("Path");
00562                     openDocument(path);
00563                 }
00564             }
00565         } catch (Exception ex) {
00566             showErrorMessage(ex.toString());
00567         }
00568 }//GEN-LAST:event_clickDocuments
00569 
00576 private void openPreferences(java.awt.event.ActionEvent evt) {//GEN-FIRST:event_openPreferences
00577     preferencesDialog = new PreferencesDialog(this, true);
00578     preferencesDialog.setVisible(true);
00579 }//GEN-LAST:event_openPreferences

00590 private void fieldURLCaretUpdate(javax.swing.event.CaretEvent evt) {//GEN-FIRST:event_fieldURLCaretUpdate
00598     String URLText = fieldURL.getText();
00599     if (!URLText.isEmpty()) {
00600         setURLValid(true);
00601     } else {
00602         setURLValid(false);
00603     }
00604 }//GEN-LAST:event_fieldURLCaretUpdate

00614 private void keyPressedDocuments(java.awt.event.KeyEvent evt) {//GEN-FIRST:event_keyPressedDocuments
00615     try {
00619         if (evt.getKeyCode() == KeyEvent.VK_ENTER) {
00620             for (int index : listDocuments.getSelectedRows()) {
00621                 String path = (String) infoDocuments.get(index).get(documentClassifierViewResources.getString("listDocuments.title3"));
00622                 openDocument(path);
00623             }
00624         }
00625     } catch (Exception ex) {
00626         showErrorMessage(ex.toString());
00627     }
00628 }//GEN-LAST:event_keyPressedDocuments
00635     public static void showErrorMessage(String msg) {
00636         JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null, msg, ResourceBundle.getBundle("documentclassifier/resources/DocumentClassifierView").getString("messages.Error"), JOptionPane.ERROR_MESSAGE);
00637     }
00638     
00646     public void preferenceChange(PreferenceChangeEvent evt) {
00651         if(evt.getKey().equals(MapDefaultPreferences.METRIC)) {
00656             Vector<String> columnIdentifiers=new Vector<String>();
00657             if(application.getMetric(false).equals("TF-IDF")) {
00661                 columnIdentifiers.add(documentClassifierViewResources.getString("listDocuments.title0.Cosine"));
00662             }
00663             else {
00667                 columnIdentifiers.add(documentClassifierViewResources.getString("listDocuments.title0.Distance"));
00668             }
00672             columnIdentifiers.add(tableModel.getColumnName(tableModel.getColumnCount()-2));
00673             columnIdentifiers.add(tableModel.getColumnName(tableModel.getColumnCount()-1));
00674             tableModel.setColumnIdentifiers(columnIdentifiers);
00675         } else if (evt.getKey().equals(MapDefaultPreferences.SCRAPER)) {
00683             setDocumentRead(false);
00684         }
00685     }

00690     @Action
00691     public void showAboutBox() {
00692         if (aboutBox == null) {
00693             JFrame mainFrame = DocumentClassifierApp.getApplication().getMainFrame();
00694             aboutBox = new DocumentClassifierAboutBox(mainFrame);
00695             aboutBox.setLocationRelativeTo(mainFrame);
00696         }
00697         DocumentClassifierApp.getApplication().show(aboutBox);
00698     }

00706     }

00770     @Action(block = Task.BlockingScope.COMPONENT, enabledProperty = "URLValid")
00771     public Task readInputDocument() {
00772         currentTask=new ReadInputDocumentTask(application, fieldURL.getText());
00773         return currentTask;
00774     }
00775     
00776     private class ReadInputDocumentTask extends org.jdesktop.application.Task<Document, Void> {
00777         
00781         private String address;
00782         
00783         ReadInputDocumentTask(org.jdesktop.application.Application app, String URL) {
00784             // Runs on the EDT.  Copy GUI state that
00785             // doInBackground() depends on from parameters
00786             // to LeggiPaginaInputTask fields, here.
00787             super(app);
00788             this.address = URL.trim();
00789         }
00790         
00791         @Override
00792         protected Document doInBackground() {
00793             // Your Task's code here.  This method runs
00794             // on a background thread, so don't reference
00795             // the Swing GUI from here.
00796             try {
00801                 setTaskRunning(true);
00807                 setDocumentRead(false);
00811                 textAreaOutput.setText("");
00812                 
00813                 setMessage(documentClassifierViewResources.getString("messages.readingScrapingDocument"));
00817                 URLConnection connection;
00818                 String[] titleText;
00819                 if (address.toLowerCase().startsWith("http://")) {
00820                     connection = (HttpURLConnection) new URL(address).openConnection();
00821                     titleText = application.readDocument(connection.getInputStream());
00822                 } else if (address.toLowerCase().startsWith("https://")) {
00823                     connection=(HttpsURLConnection) new URL(address).openConnection();
00824                     titleText = application.readDocument(connection.getInputStream());
00825                 } else if (address.toLowerCase().startsWith("file://")) {
00826                     titleText = application.readDocument(new FileInputStream(address.substring(7)));
00827                 } else {
00828                     titleText = application.readDocument(new FileInputStream(address));
00829                 }
00830                 setMessage(documentClassifierViewResources.getString("messages.Document")+" "+documentClassifierViewResources.getString("messages.Read").toLowerCase());
00835                 currentQuery = new Document(titleText[0], titleText[1], address);
00836                 return currentQuery;
00837             } catch (Exception ex) {
00838                 currentQuery=new Document(address);
00839             } finally {
00840                 return currentQuery;
00841             }
00842         }
00843         
00852         @Override
00853         protected void succeeded(Document result) {
00854             // Runs on the EDT.  Update the GUI based on
00855             // the result computed by doInBackground().
00860             labelTitle.setText(result.getTitle());
00861             labelText.setText(result.getText());
00862             setDocumentRead(true);
00863         }
00864         
00872         @Override
00873         protected void failed(Throwable ex) {
00874             showErrorMessage(ex.getMessage());
00875         }
00876         
00881         @Override
00882         protected void finished() {
00888             setMessage("");
00889             setTaskRunning(false);
00890         }
00891         
00892     }
00893     
00901     @Action(block = Task.BlockingScope.COMPONENT, enabledProperty="documentRead")
00902     public Task rankDocuments() {
00903         currentTask = new RankDocumentsTask(getApplication(), currentQuery, application.getTrainingSet(), application.getKNN(false), true);
00904         return currentTask;
00905     }
00906     
00907     private class RankDocumentsTask extends org.jdesktop.application.Task<LinkedList<Map<String,Object>>, Void> {
00908         
00912         private Document query;
00916         private Set<Set<Document>> trainingSet;
00920         private int KNN;
00925         private boolean visualizeListDocuments;
00926         
00936         RankDocumentsTask(org.jdesktop.application.Application app, Document query, Set<Set<Document>> trainingSet, int KNN, boolean visualizzaListaDocumenti) {
00937             // Runs on the EDT.  Copy GUI state that
00938             // doInBackground() depends on from parameters
00939             // to DeterminaCategoriaTask fields, here.
00940             super(app);
00941             this.query = query;
00942             this.trainingSet = trainingSet;
00943             this.KNN=KNN;
00944             this.visualizeListDocuments=visualizzaListaDocumenti;
00945         }
00946 
00947         @Override
00948         protected LinkedList<Map<String,Object>> doInBackground() {
00949             // Your Task's code here.  This method runs
00950             // on a background thread, so don't reference
00951             // the Swing GUI from here.
00952             try {
00957                 setTaskRunning(true);
00966                 LinkedList<Entry<Map<String,Object>, Map<String, Double>>> listDocuments=new LinkedList<Entry<Map<String, Object>, Map<String, Double>>>();
00967                 infoDocuments=new LinkedList<Map<String, Object>>();
00971                 tableModel.setRowCount(0);
00975                 String metric=application.getMetric(false);
00976                 
00977                 setMessage(documentClassifierViewResources.getString("messages.readingTrainingSet")+"...");
00978                 
00984                 Map<String, Object> infoDocument=new LinkedHashMap<String, Object>();
00985                 infoDocument.put("Distance", new Double(1.0));
00986                 infoDocument.put("Categories", "Query");
00987                 infoDocument.put("Title", labelTitle.getText());
00988                 infoDocument.put("Path", fieldURL.getText());
00989 
00994                 Map<String, Double> histogram = new HashMap<String, Double>();
00998                 Entry<Map<String,Object>, Map<String, Double>> entryDocument;
01004                 for(Set<Document> subSetTrainingSet : trainingSet ) {
01005                     for (Document currentDocument : subSetTrainingSet) {
01006                         infoDocument=new LinkedHashMap<String, Object>();
01007                         setMessage(documentClassifierViewResources.getString("messages.readingDocument")+" '" + currentDocument.getTitle() + "'...");
01008                         histogram=new HashMap<String, Double>(currentDocument.getHistogram());
01009                         infoDocument.put("Categories", currentDocument.getCategories());
01010                         infoDocument.put("Title", currentDocument.getTitle());
01011                         infoDocument.put("Path", currentDocument.getPath());
01012                         entryDocument=new AbstractMap.SimpleEntry<Map<String, Object>,Map<String,Double>>(infoDocument, histogram);
01013                         if(!listDocuments.contains(entryDocument)) {
01014                             listDocuments.add(entryDocument);
01015                         }
01016                     }
01017                 }
01018 
01019                 if (metric.equals("Bhattacharrya")) {
01024                     setMessage(documentClassifierViewResources.getString("messages.bhattacharryaCalculation")+"...");
01025                     BhattacharryaDistanceComparator.calculateDistance(listDocuments, query.getHistogram());
01026                     setMessage("Ranking...");
01027                     Collections.sort((List<Entry<Map<String,Object>, Map<String, Double>>>) listDocuments, new BhattacharryaDistanceComparator());
01028                 } else {
01033                     setMessage(documentClassifierViewResources.getString("messages.cosineCalculation")+"...");
01034                     TFIDFComparator.calculateCosine(listDocuments, query.getHistogram());
01035                     setMessage("Ranking...");
01036                     Collections.sort((List<Entry<Map<String,Object>, Map<String, Double>>>) listDocuments, new TFIDFComparator());
01037                 }
01038                 
01039                 for(Entry<Map<String, Object>,Map<String,Double>> currentDocument : listDocuments) {
01040                     infoDocuments.add(currentDocument.getKey());
01041                 }
01042                 listDocuments=null;
01043                 
01044                 if(visualizeListDocuments) {
01045                     
01046                     for (int i = 0; i < infoDocuments.size(); i++) {
01047                         //i: Row number
01048                         Vector<Object> infoRow=new Vector<Object>();
01049                         infoDocument=infoDocuments.get(i);
01054                         infoRow.add(String.format("%6.5f",infoDocument.get("Distance")) + (metric.equals("TF-IDF") ? " ("+String.format("%4.2f",infoDocument.get("Angle"))+"°)" : ""));
01055                         infoRow.add(infoDocument.get("Categories"));
01056                         infoRow.add(infoDocument.get("Title"));
01057                         infoRow.add(infoDocument.get("Path"));
01058                         tableModel.addRow(infoRow);
01059                     }
01060                 }
01066                 return infoDocuments;
01067             } catch (Exception ex) {
01068                 failed(ex);
01069                 return null;
01070             }
01071         }
01072         
01082         @Override
01083         protected void succeeded(LinkedList<Map<String,Object>> result) {
01084             // Runs on the EDT.  Update the GUI based on
01085             // the result computed by doInBackground().
01086             String category=determineCategory(result,KNN);
01087             setMessage(documentClassifierViewResources.getString("messages.estimatedCategory")+": '"+category + "'");
01088         }
01089         
01097         @Override
01098         protected void failed(Throwable ex) {
01099             showErrorMessage(ex.toString());
01100         }
01101         
01108         @Override
01109         protected void finished() {
01110             setTaskRunning(false);
01111         }
01112         
01113     }
01114     
01124     private String determineCategory(LinkedList<Map<String, Object>> infoDocuments, int K) {
01125 
01136         Map<String, Entry<Integer, Integer>> categoriesFrequencies = new HashMap<String, Entry<Integer, Integer>>();
01137         Set<String> categoriesCurrentDocument;
01138         int maxFrequency, currentFrequency;
01139         Entry<Integer, Integer> currentEntry;
01140         Entry<String, Entry<Integer, Integer>> maxEntry = null;
01141         int numberExaminedCategories=0;
01142         boolean exit=false;
01143         for (int i = 0; i < K; i++) {
01144             categoriesCurrentDocument=(Set<String>) infoDocuments.get(i).get("Categories");
01145             for(String currentCategory : categoriesCurrentDocument) {
01146                 numberExaminedCategories++;
01147                 currentEntry = (SimpleEntry<Integer, Integer>) categoriesFrequencies.get(currentCategory);
01148                 if (currentEntry == null) {
01149                     currentEntry = new AbstractMap.SimpleEntry<Integer,Integer>(i, 0);
01150                 }
01151                 currentEntry.setValue(currentEntry.getValue() + 1);
01152                 //The frequency of the current category is incremented by 1
01153                 categoriesFrequencies.put(currentCategory, currentEntry);
01154                 
01155                 if (i == 0) {
01161                     maxEntry = new AbstractMap.SimpleEntry<String,Entry<Integer,Integer>>(currentCategory, currentEntry);
01162                 }
01163                 maxFrequency = maxEntry.getValue().getValue();
01164                 currentFrequency = currentEntry.getValue();
01165                 if (currentFrequency > maxFrequency ||
01166                         (currentFrequency == maxFrequency && currentEntry.getKey() < maxEntry.getValue().getKey())) {
01167                     maxEntry = new AbstractMap.SimpleEntry<String,Entry<Integer,Integer>>(currentCategory, currentEntry);
01168                 }
01169             }
01170             if(exit) {
01171                 break;
01172             }
01177             if(i<=infoDocuments.size()-2 && numberExaminedCategories+((Set<String>)infoDocuments.get(i+1).get("Categories")).size()>=K) {
01178                 exit=true;
01179             }
01180         }
01181         return maxEntry.getKey();
01182     }
01183     
01192     @Action(block = Task.BlockingScope.WINDOW)
01193     public Task Validation() {
01194         return new ValidationTask(getApplication(),application.getMaximumKNNValidation(false));
01195     }
01196     
01197     private class ValidationTask extends org.jdesktop.application.Task<Entry<Integer,Double>, Void> {
01198         
01199         int KNNMinimum,KNNMaximum;
01200         boolean isStratified,isLogging;
01201         long startTime,stopTime;
01202         FileHandler FH;
01203         Logger infoLogger;
01204         
01205         ValidationTask(org.jdesktop.application.Application app,int KNNMaximum) {
01206             // Runs on the EDT.  Copy GUI state that
01207             // doInBackground() depends on from parameters
01208             // to trainTask fields, here.
01209             super(app);
01210             try {
01211                 this.KNNMinimum = application.getKNNMinimum();
01212                 this.KNNMaximum = KNNMaximum;
01213                 this.isStratified = application.isStratified(false);
01214                 this.isLogging=application.isLogging(false);
01215                 if(isLogging) {
01221                     FH = new FileHandler(application.getLogFile(false), !application.isOverwriteLogFile(false));
01222                     FH.setLevel(Level.INFO);
01223                     FH.setFormatter(new SimpleFormatter());
01224                     infoLogger = Logger.getLogger(DocumentClassifierView.class.getName());
01225                     for (Handler currentHandler : infoLogger.getHandlers()) {
01226                         infoLogger.removeHandler(currentHandler);
01227                     }
01228                     infoLogger.addHandler(FH);
01229                 }
01230             } catch (Exception ex) {
01231                 showErrorMessage(ex.getMessage());
01232                 cancel(false);
01233             }
01234         }
01235         
01236         @Override
01237         protected Entry<Integer,Double> doInBackground() throws InterruptedException, ExecutionException {
01238             // Your Task's code here.  This method runs
01239             // on a background thread, so don't reference
01240             // the Swing GUI from here.
01241             
01260             startTime=Calendar.getInstance().getTimeInMillis();
01261             fieldURL.setText("");
01262             labelTitle.setText("");
01263             labelText.setText("");
01264             textAreaOutput.setText("");
01265             setDocumentRead(false);
01266             int KFold=application.getKFold(false);
01267             
01275             Entry<Integer,Double> minimumError = new AbstractMap.SimpleEntry<Integer,Double>(0, Double.MAX_VALUE);
01279             Map<Integer, Double> averageErrors = new HashMap<Integer, Double>();
01285             Set<Set<Document>> copyTrainingSet=new HashSet<Set<Document>>();
01286             for (Set<Document> currentSubSet : application.getTrainingSet() ) {
01287                 Set<Document> copyCurrentSubSet=new HashSet<Document>();
01288                 copyCurrentSubSet.addAll(currentSubSet);
01289                 copyTrainingSet.add(copyCurrentSubSet);
01290             }
01291             
01292             Iterator randomIteratorTrainingSet=null;
01293             int numberCategories=copyTrainingSet.size();
01294             //Dimension of every fold
01295             int foldDimension=application.getTrainingSetSize()/KFold;
01296             int numberDocumentsForCategory=0;
01297             if(isStratified) {
01298                 foldDimension = (foldDimension/numberCategories) * numberCategories;
01299                 numberDocumentsForCategory=foldDimension/numberCategories;
01300             } else {
01301                 Set<Document> normalizedTrainingSet=new HashSet<Document>();
01302                 for(Set<Document> currentSubSet: copyTrainingSet) {
01303                     normalizedTrainingSet.addAll(currentSubSet);
01304                 }
01305                 randomIteratorTrainingSet=normalizedTrainingSet.iterator();
01306             }
01307             
01312             Set<Set<Document>> partitionedTrainingSet=new HashSet<Set<Document>>();
01313             Set<Document> trainingSetSubSet;
01314             Iterator iteratorTrainingSetCategory;                               //Iterator on the training set's categories
01315             for(int j=0;j<KFold;j++) {                                          //1
01316                 trainingSetSubSet=new LinkedHashSet<Document>();
01317                 if(isStratified) {
01318                     for(Set<Document> currentCategory: copyTrainingSet) {
01319                         iteratorTrainingSetCategory=currentCategory.iterator();
01320                         for(int z=0;z<numberDocumentsForCategory;z++) {
01321                             trainingSetSubSet.add((Document) iteratorTrainingSetCategory.next());
01322                             iteratorTrainingSetCategory.remove();
01323                         }
01324                     }
01325                 } else {
01326                     for(int z=0;z<foldDimension;z++) {
01327                         trainingSetSubSet.add((Document) randomIteratorTrainingSet.next());
01328                     }
01329                 }
01330                 partitionedTrainingSet.add(trainingSetSubSet);
01331             }
01332             
01333             final int totalNumberIterations=(KNNMaximum-(KNNMinimum+1)+1)*foldDimension*KFold;
01334             int indexCurrentIteration=0;
01335             int indexCurrentDocument;
01336             int indexCurrentFold;
01337             int errorCounter;
01338             String calculatedCategory;
01339             Set<String> effectiveCategories;
01340             Set<Set<Document>> currentTrainingSet;
01341             String isStratificato=(application.isStratified(false)) ? "" : documentClassifierViewResources.getString("messages.Not")+" ";
01342             isStratificato+=documentClassifierViewResources.getString("messages.Stratified");
01343             isStratificato=isStratificato.toLowerCase();
01344             boolean orderDocuments;
01350             Map<Document,LinkedList<Map<String, Object>>> infoRankedDocuments=new HashMap<Document, LinkedList<Map<String, Object>>>();
01351             for (int i = KNNMinimum; i <= KNNMaximum; i++) {
01357                 orderDocuments=(i==KNNMinimum);
01358                 String currentMessage="K-NN: "+i+"/"+KNNMaximum+" - K-Fold: "+KFold+" ["+documentClassifierViewResources.getString("messages.Partitioning")+" "+isStratificato+"] \n";
01359                 if(orderDocuments) {
01360                     currentMessage += "("+documentClassifierViewResources.getString("messages.rankingOrderingDocuments")+"...)";
01361                 }
01362                 setMessage(currentMessage);
01363                 textAreaOutput.append(currentMessage+"\n");
01364                 if(isLogging) {         //If logging is enabled
01365                     infoLogger.info(currentMessage);
01366                 }
01367                 
01368                 indexCurrentFold=0;
01369                 errorCounter=0;
01370                 for ( Set<Document> currentControlSet : partitionedTrainingSet ) {   //2.1
01371                     
01372                     indexCurrentFold++;
01373                     currentTrainingSet=new HashSet<Set<Document>>(partitionedTrainingSet);
01374                     currentTrainingSet.remove(currentControlSet);               //2.1.1
01375                     indexCurrentDocument=0;
01376                     for(Document currentQuery: currentControlSet) {             //2.1.2
01377                         indexCurrentDocument++;
01378                         if(!orderDocuments) {
01379                             indexCurrentIteration++;
01380                             setProgress(indexCurrentIteration,1,totalNumberIterations);
01381                         }
01382                         
01383                         if(application.isVisualizeCurrentDocument(false)) {
01388                             fieldURL.setText(currentQuery.getPath());
01389                             labelTitle.setText(currentQuery.getTitle());
01390                             labelText.setText(currentQuery.getText());
01391                         }
01392                         
01393                         if(orderDocuments) {                                    //2.1.2.1
01394                             currentTask = new RankDocumentsTask(getApplication(), currentQuery, currentTrainingSet, i, application.isVisualizeListRankedDocuments(false));
01395                             currentTask.execute();
01396                             infoRankedDocuments.put(currentQuery,((RankDocumentsTask)currentTask).get());
01397                             currentTask=null;
01398                         }
01399                         calculatedCategory = determineCategory(infoRankedDocuments.get(currentQuery), i);
01400                         effectiveCategories = currentQuery.getCategories();
01401                         if (!effectiveCategories.contains(calculatedCategory)) {//2.1.2.2
01402                             errorCounter++;
01403                         }
01404                         currentMessage=documentClassifierViewResources.getString("messages.Document")+" n° "+indexCurrentDocument+"/"+foldDimension+" (fold n° "+indexCurrentFold+"): "+documentClassifierViewResources.getString("messages.estimatedCategory")+": '"+calculatedCategory+"', "+documentClassifierViewResources.getString("messages.effectiveCategories")+": '"+effectiveCategories+"' - "+documentClassifierViewResources.getString("messages.currentNumberErrors")+": "+errorCounter;
01405                         textAreaOutput.append(currentMessage+"\n");
01406                         if(isLogging) {
01407                             infoLogger.info(currentMessage);
01408                         }
01409                         effectiveCategories=null;
01410                     }
01411                     currentTrainingSet=null;
01412                 }
01413                 double classificationError=((double)errorCounter/(KFold*foldDimension))*100;    //2.2
01414                 currentMessage=documentClassifierViewResources.getString("messages.classificationError")+" "+documentClassifierViewResources.getString("messages.For").toLowerCase()+" K-NN="+i+" "+documentClassifierViewResources.getString("messages.And").toLowerCase()+" K-Fold="+KFold+": "+classificationError+"%";
01415                 textAreaOutput.append(currentMessage+"\n");
01416                 if(isLogging) {
01417                     infoLogger.info(currentMessage);
01418                 }
01419                 
01420                 averageErrors.put(i, classificationError);
01421                 
01422                 if (classificationError < minimumError.getValue()) {            //4
01423                     minimumError = new AbstractMap.SimpleEntry<Integer,Double>(i, classificationError);
01424                 }
01425             }
01426             return minimumError;
01427         }
01428         
01440         @Override
01441         protected void succeeded(Entry<Integer,Double> result) {
01442             try {
01443                 // Runs on the EDT.  Update the GUI based on
01444                 // the result computed by doInBackground().
01445                 String currentMessage = documentClassifierViewResources.getString("messages.optimalValueKNN")+" " + result.getKey() + " ("+documentClassifierViewResources.getString("messages.classificationError")+": " + result.getValue() + "%)";
01446                 setMessage(currentMessage);
01447                 textAreaOutput.append(currentMessage+"\n");
01448                 if(isLogging) {
01449                     infoLogger.info(currentMessage);
01450                 }
01451                 stopTime = Calendar.getInstance().getTimeInMillis();
01452                 long elapsedTime = stopTime - startTime;
01453                 textAreaOutput.append(documentClassifierViewResources.getString("messages.totalExecutionTime") + ": " + elapsedTime + " ms");
01454                 application.setKNN(result.getKey());
01455             } catch (Exception ex) {
01456                 showErrorMessage(ex.getMessage());
01457             }
01458         }
01459         
01463         @Override
01464         protected void cancelled() {
01465             setMessage("");
01466         }
01467         
01475         @Override
01476         protected void failed(Throwable ex) {
01477             cancelled();
01478         }
01479     }
